snippet: Take away the numeric data and few handicappers -- and probably even fewer two-dollar bettors -- likely could spot a true "quality" horse at first glance without clutching their quantitative performance data as an essential guidepost.
abstract: Take away the numeric data and few handicappers -- and probably even fewer two-dollar bettors -- likely could spot a true "quality" horse at first glance without clutching their quantitative performance data as an essential guidepost.

headline.main: Defining the 'It' Horse in the Derby
